pages.text: $(li)The Efficency enchantment can be applied in any kind of Pickaxe, Shovel, Axe, Hoe, Pickarang, Flamarang or Shears.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the mining speed of the enchanted tool.
pages.title: Efficency

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level V.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level VI of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Efficency).
